name: Coop Villager
description:
NOTE:
College wifi may not allow you to connect to others or be laggy.

INFO:
Play solo or with a friend and explore and build a little town!

CREDIT:
Music by the incredibly talented Hji Zerena from their album Remember Eternity - CC0 - 1.0
Originally inspired by the Pico-8 game by Partnano

KNOWN BUGS:
Bridges appear weird on the coop's screen.

COMING SOON:
More than two multiplayer, Sound Effects and Fences!
